howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: Open TikTok/Douyin app and find the video you want to download
howToUse.step2: Tap the share button and select 'Copy Link'
howToUse.step3: Paste the link into the input box above and click 'Parse Video'
howToUse.step4: After parsing is complete, click the download button to save the video

features.title: Features
features.item1: No Watermark: Downloaded videos have no watermarks
features.item2: Multi-Platform: Support TikTok, Instagram, Douyin and more
features.item3: High Quality: Preserve original video quality

features.item5: Fast Parse: Parse in seconds, instant download
features.item6: Privacy Protected: No user data stored

q1.question: How to download TikTok videos?
q1.answer: Open TikTok app, find the video you want to download, tap the share button, select 'Copy Link', then paste the link into our tool's input box and click 'Parse Video'.

q2.question: Do downloaded videos have watermarks?
q2.answer: Our tool automatically removes video watermarks. Downloaded videos are watermark-free HD originals.

q3.question: Do I need to login or register?
q3.answer: Not at all! Our tool is 100% free and requires no registration or login.

q4.question: Which platforms are supported?
q4.answer: Currently supports: Douyin, TikTok, Instagram, Suno Music, Kuaishou, YouTube Shorts, Facebook and other mainstream platforms.

q5.question: Can I use downloaded videos commercially?
q5.answer: Downloaded videos are for personal learning and appreciation only. For commercial use, please contact the original author for authorization. Please respect the copyright of original creators.

videoDownloader.disclaimer: Downloaded content is for personal learning only, please respect original author's copyright

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are committed to providing users with the best free online video download service

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Make video downloading simple, fast, and free
mission.content1: Our video downloader supports multiple mainstream platforms such as Douyin, TikTok, Instagram, and Suno Music. No software installation required, just paste the link to quickly download watermark-free HD videos.
mission.content2: We believe everyone should be able to easily save and share their favorite content. Therefore, we provide a completely free service with no registration, no payment, and free forever.
